seo.title: Setup — HALO PushButton
seo.description: Start the HALO PushButton launch checklist, confirm contacts, and complete Test & Verified.

setup.title: Start your HALO PushButton launch
setup.intro: Use this checklist to get set up, confirm contacts, and run Test & Verified when it is safe.

wizard.title: HALO Setup Wizard
wizard.intro: Complete each step to capture contact details and document Test & Verified.

connection.title: Step 1 — Connection
connection.body: Collect Wi-Fi details or skip for now.
connection.confirmation_note: This prepares information; device connection is confirmed during Test & Verified.
connection.wifi_assist_body: You are likely already connected to the Wi-Fi you want HALO to use. Confirm the network name in your device Wi-Fi settings and enter it here.
connection.wifi_assist_cellular_hint: It looks like you may be on cellular. Switch to your home Wi-Fi before continuing.
connection.wifi_assist_wifi_hint: If you are on Wi-Fi, this is likely the correct network.

contacts.title: Step 2 — Contacts
contacts.body: Add at least one contact. Each contact can include a phone number and/or email address.
contacts.mobile_label: This phone number is a mobile (cell) phone
contacts.helper: At least one contact must include a phone number or email address.

notifications.title: Step 3 — Notification Preferences
notifications.body: Select which notification methods should be used once enabled.
notifications.none_enabled_note: Notification methods will be confirmed during verification.

review.title: Step 4 — Review
review.body: Confirm the details below before beginning Test & Verified.
review.edit_note: Update any step as needed before proceeding.

test_verified.title: Step 5 — Test & Verified
test_verified.body: Confirm each test when it is safe to do so.
test_verified.safety_note: Do not use Test Mode during an emergency.

checks.base_unit: Base unit HELP trigger test confirmed
checks.pendant: Included pendant HELP trigger test confirmed

summary.title: Step 6 — Test Summary
summary.body: Summary of Test & Verified checks that applied.

checklist.title: Start checklist
items: Place the pushbutton where it is easy to reach.
Confirm the device and contacts are ready before testing.
Run Test & Verified at a safe time.

after_setup.title: After setup
after_setup.body: If anything fails during Test & Verified, use the support steps to fix only what failed and re-test.

seo.title: Privacy — HALO — Reliable Elder Care
seo.description: Plain-language privacy posture. Avoid absolutes unless enforceable.

body_blocks.title: Privacy, plainly
body_blocks.body: We aim to keep the HALO experience focused on safety and usability. Privacy commitments published here must be specific, enforceable, and consistent with our policies and agreements.

body_blocks.title: What this page is not
body_blocks.body: This page is not a promise of absolutes unless explicitly stated in enforceable terms. We avoid broad claims that cannot be verified or controlled.

body_blocks.title: Your choices
body_blocks.body: You choose who gets notified and how. Verification is documented through Test & Verified.
